java/liquibase/dbdoc/HTMLWriter.java

00001 package liquibase.dbdoc;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.ChangeSet;
00004 import liquibase.change.Change;
00005 import liquibase.database.Database;
00006 import liquibase.exception.DatabaseHistoryException;
00007 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00008 import liquibase.util.LiquibaseUtil;
00009 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00010 
00011 import java.io.File;
00012 import java.io.FileWriter;
00013 import java.io.IOException;
00014 import java.text.DateFormat;
00015 import java.util.Date;
00016 import java.util.List;
00017 
00018 public abstract class HTMLWriter {
00019     protected File outputDir;
00020     protected Database database;
00021 
00022     public HTMLWriter(File outputDir, Database database) {
00023         this.outputDir = outputDir;
00024         this.database = database;
00025         if (!outputDir.exists()) {
00026             outputDir.mkdirs();
00027         }
00028     }
00029 
00030     protected abstract void writeCustomHTML(FileWriter fileWriter, Object object, List<Change> changes, Database database) throws IOException;
00031 
00032     private FileWriter createFileWriter(Object object) throws IOException {
00033         return new FileWriter(new File(outputDir, object.toString().toLowerCase() + ".html"));
00034     }
00035 
00036     public void writeHTML(Object object, List<Change> ranChanges, List<Change> changesToRun, String changeLog) throws IOException, DatabaseHistoryException, JDBCException {
00037         FileWriter fileWriter = createFileWriter(object);
00038 
00039 
00040         try {
00041             fileWriter.append("<html>");
00042             writeHeader(object, fileWriter);
00043             fileWriter.append("<body BGCOLOR=\"white\" onload=\"windowTitle();\">");
00044 
00045             fileWriter.append("<H2>").append(createTitle(object)).append("</H2>\n");
00046 
00047             writeBody(fileWriter, object, ranChanges, changesToRun);
00048 
00049             writeFooter(fileWriter, changeLog);
00050 
00051             fileWriter.append("</body>");
00052             fileWriter.append("</html>");
00053         } finally {
00054             fileWriter.close();
00055         }
00056 
00057     }
00058 
00059     private void writeFooter(FileWriter fileWriter, String changeLog) throws IOException {
00060         fileWriter.append("<hr>Generated: ");
00061         fileWriter.append(DateFormat.getDateTimeInstance(DateFormat.SHORT, DateFormat.SHORT).format(new Date()));
00062         fileWriter.append("<BR>Against: ");
00063         fileWriter.append(database.toString());
00064         fileWriter.append("<BR>Change Log: ");
00065         fileWriter.append(changeLog);
00066         fileWriter.append("<BR><BR>Generated By: ");
00067         fileWriter.append("<a href='http://www.liquibase.org' target='_TOP'>LiquiBase ").append(LiquibaseUtil.getBuildVersion()).append("</a>");
00068     }
00069 
00070     protected void writeBody(FileWriter fileWriter, Object object, List<Change> ranChanges, List<Change> changesToRun) throws IOException, DatabaseHistoryException, JDBCException {
00071         writeCustomHTML(fileWriter, object, ranChanges, database);
00072         writeChanges("Pending Changes", fileWriter, changesToRun);
00073         writeChanges("Past Changes", fileWriter, ranChanges);
00074     }
00075 
00076     protected void writeTable(String title, List<List<String>> cells, FileWriter fileWriter) throws IOException {
00077         fileWriter.append("<P>");
00078         fileWriter.append("<TABLE BORDER=\"1\" WIDTH=\"100%\" CELLPADDING=\"3\" CELLSPACING=\"0\" SUMMARY=\"\">\n")
00079                 .append("<TR BGCOLOR=\"#CCCCFF\" CLASS=\"TableHeadingColor\">\n").append("<TD COLSPAN=").append(String.valueOf(cells.get(0).size())).append("><FONT SIZE=\"+2\">\n").append("<B>").append(title).append("</B></FONT></TD>\n")
00080                 .append("</TR>\n");
00081 
00082         for (List<String> row : cells) {
00083             fileWriter.append("<TR BGCOLOR=\"white\" CLASS=\"TableRowColor\">\n");
00084             for (String cell : row) {
00085                 writeTD(fileWriter, cell);
00086             }
00087             fileWriter.append("</TR>\n");
00088         }
00089         fileWriter.append("</TABLE>\n");
00090     }
00091 
00092     private void writeTD(FileWriter fileWriter, String filePath) throws IOException {
00093         fileWriter.append("<TD VALIGN=\"top\">\n");
00094         fileWriter.append(filePath);
00095         fileWriter.append("</TD>\n");
00096     }
00097 
00098     private void writeHeader(Object object, FileWriter fileWriter) throws IOException {
00099         String title = createTitle(object);
00100         fileWriter.append("<head>")
00101                 .append("<title>").append(title).append("</title>")
00102                 .append("<LINK REL =\"stylesheet\" TYPE=\"text/css\" HREF=\"../../stylesheet.css\" TITLE=\"Style\">")
00103                 .append("<SCRIPT type=\"text/javascript\">")
00104                 .append("function windowTitle()")
00105                 .append("{").append("    parent.document.title=\"").append(title).append("\";")
00106                 .append("}")
00107                 .append("</SCRIPT>")
00108                 .append("</head>");
00109     }
00110 
00111     protected abstract String createTitle(Object object);
00112 
00113     protected void writeChanges(String title, FileWriter fileWriter, List<Change> changes) throws IOException, DatabaseHistoryException, JDBCException {
00114         fileWriter.append("<p><TABLE BORDER=\"1\" WIDTH=\"100%\" CELLPADDING=\"3\" CELLSPACING=\"0\" SUMMARY=\"\">\n");
00115         fileWriter.append("<TR BGCOLOR=\"#CCCCFF\" CLASS=\"TableHeadingColor\">\n");
00116         fileWriter.append("<TD COLSPAN='4'><FONT SIZE=\"+2\">\n");
00117         fileWriter.append("<B>");
00118         fileWriter.append(title);
00119         fileWriter.append("</B></FONT></TD>\n");
00120         fileWriter.append("</TR>\n");
00121 
00122         ChangeSet lastChangeSet = null;
00123         if (changes == null || changes.size() == 0) {
00124             fileWriter.append("<tr><td>None Found</td></tr>");
00125         } else {
00126             for (Change change : changes) {
00127                 if (!change.getChangeSet().equals(lastChangeSet)) {
00128                     lastChangeSet = change.getChangeSet();
00129                     fileWriter.append("<TR BGCOLOR=\"#EEEEFF\" CLASS=\"TableSubHeadingColor\">\n");
00130                     writeTD(fileWriter, "<a href='../changelogs/"+change.getChangeSet().getFilePath()+".xml'>"+change.getChangeSet().getFilePath()+"</a>");
00131                     writeTD(fileWriter, change.getChangeSet().getId());
00132                     writeTD(fileWriter, "<a href='../authors/"+change.getChangeSet().getAuthor().toLowerCase()+".html'>"+change.getChangeSet().getAuthor().toLowerCase()+"</a>");
00133 
00134                     ChangeSet.RunStatus runStatus = database.getRunStatus(change.getChangeSet());
00135                     if (runStatus.equals(ChangeSet.RunStatus.NOT_RAN)) {
00136                         String anchor = change.getChangeSet().toString(false).replaceAll("\\W","_");
00137                         writeTD(fileWriter, "NOT YET RAN [<a href='../pending/sql.html#"+ anchor +"'>SQL</a>]");
00138                     } else if (runStatus.equals(ChangeSet.RunStatus.INVALID_MD5SUM)) {
00139                         writeTD(fileWriter, "INVALID MD5SUM");
00140                     } else if (runStatus.equals(ChangeSet.RunStatus.ALREADY_RAN)) {
00141                         writeTD(fileWriter, "Executed "+ DateFormat.getDateTimeInstance(DateFormat.SHORT, DateFormat.SHORT).format(database.getRanDate(change.getChangeSet())));
00142                     } else if (runStatus.equals(ChangeSet.RunStatus.RUN_AGAIN)) {
00143                         writeTD(fileWriter, "Executed, WILL RUN AGAIN");
00144                     } else {
00145                         throw new RuntimeException("Unknown run status: "+runStatus);
00146                     }
00147 
00148                     fileWriter.append("</TR>");
00149 
00150                     if (StringUtils.trimToNull(change.getChangeSet().getComments()) != null) {
00151                         fileWriter.append("<TR><TD BGCOLOR='#EEEEFF' CLASS='TableSubHeadingColor' colspan='4'>").append(change.getChangeSet().getComments()).append("</TD></TR>");
00152                     }
00153 
00154                 }
00155 
00156                 fileWriter.append("<TR BGCOLOR=\"white\" CLASS=\"TableRowColor\">\n");
00157                 fileWriter.append("<td colspan='4'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;").append(change.getConfirmationMessage()).append("</td></TR>");
00158             }
00159         }
00160 
00161         fileWriter.append("</TABLE>");
00162         fileWriter.append("&nbsp;</P>");        
00163 
00164     }
00165 }
